me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.api.rotation

Class SubstitutionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.api.rotation.SubstitutionHandler

  • public final class SubstitutionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to substitute the default rotation manager for a different one

        Change the rotation manager to something else. Only useful BEFORE MinigameManager enables.
        Parameters:
        rotationManager - The rotation manager class to use. MUST have a public constructor that accepts a MinigameManager instance and an int.
